trans-unit.source: Represents a class that manages the current instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy osztály, amely felügyeli az aktuális példányát jelöli egy <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály nem örökölhető.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class also provides the query interface over the current instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Ez az osztály a lekérdezési felületet is biztosít a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> aktuális példányának keresztül

trans-unit.source: By using an instance of this class, you can make various queries on the StateMachineWorkflowInstance.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály példányának használatával biztosíthatja a StateMachineWorkflowInstance a különböző lekérdezésekben.

trans-unit.source: Typical queries that can be made are as follows: - Current state of the state machine.
trans-unit.target: Tipikus lekérdezések beállíthatja, hogy a következők: - aktuális az állapotjelző gép állapota.

trans-unit.source: - Possible transitions from the current state.
trans-unit.target: -Lehetséges Váltás az aktuális állapot.

trans-unit.source: - History of transitions for the state machine instance.
trans-unit.target: -A állapot virtuálisgép-példányt a váltások számáról előzményeit.

trans-unit.source: - Enumeration of all the states in the state machine.
trans-unit.target: -Az állapotjelző gép lévő összes állapotok enumerálása.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The current workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális munkafolyamat-futtatókörnyezetnek.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>azt jelzi, hogy a példánya a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: runtime is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: runtimenull hivatkozás ( a Visual Basic nyelvben).

trans-unit.source: or instanceId is an empty .
trans-unit.target: vagy instanceId egy üres .

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently executing <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a jelenleg végrehajtás alatt álló <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi az aktuális nevét <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális neve <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Posts a message to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Üzenetet küldi a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: A munkafolyamat várólista neve.

trans-unit.source: The object to queue.
trans-unit.target: A várólista-objektum.

trans-unit.source: Posts a message to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Üzenetet küldi a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: A munkafolyamat várólista neve.

trans-unit.source: The object to queue.
trans-unit.target: A várólista-objektum.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> that allows the sender to be notified when the item is delivered.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"> </xref> , amely lehetővé teszi, hogy a küldő a cikk a rendszer értesítést.

trans-unit.source: An object to be passed to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> methods.
trans-unit.target: Egy objektum átadását a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"> </xref> módszerek.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the current instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref:System.Guid>azt jelzi, hogy az aktuális példányát a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the current instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>azt jelzi, hogy az aktuális példányát a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of state transitions that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> can make.
trans-unit.target: Állapotok közötti átmenetet gyűjteménye, amely lekérdezi az aktuális <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> is.

trans-unit.source: A collection of state transitions that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> can make.
trans-unit.target: Állapot gyűjteménye, amelyek átkerül az aktuális <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> is.

trans-unit.source: Provides a transition to a specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> using the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A megadott átmenet biztosít <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> nevével a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to transition to.
trans-unit.target: Neve a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> való áttéréssel.

trans-unit.source: targetStateName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: targetStateNamenull hivatkozás ( a Visual Basic nyelvben).

trans-unit.source: The specified by targetStateName is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: A által megadott targetStateName null hivatkozás ().

trans-unit.source: Provides a transition to a specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A megadott átmenet biztosít <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to transition to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> való áttéréssel.

trans-unit.source: targetState is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: targetStatenull hivatkozás ( a Visual Basic nyelvben).

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of state activities that the state machine workflow instance has transitioned through.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi, hogy az állapot gép munkafolyamat-példány átváltott keresztül állapot tevékenységek gyűjteménye.

trans-unit.source: This property only returns the state history if the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is used.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság csak eredménye az állapot előzményeinek, ha a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>szolgál.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: An `InvalidOperationException` occurs if the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is not installed.
trans-unit.target: Egy `InvalidOperationException` akkor fordul elő, ha a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>nincs telepítve.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: If there is no state history for a newly created instance, state history is created without the instance being started.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy újonnan létrehozott példány nem állapot előzményeinek, állapot előzményeinek a példány éppen kezdett nélkül jön létre.

trans-unit.source: A collection of transitions that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> has made.
trans-unit.target: Gyűjteménye, amelyek átkerül a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> hajtott végre.

trans-unit.source: Gets the latest definition of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A legújabb definíció lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property only returns a copy of the workflow definition and never the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság csak a munkafolyamat-definíciót, és soha nem a élő példány fa olyan másolatát adja vissza.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the activity tree that is returned by this property cannot be used to query for run-time values.
trans-unit.target: Ezért ez a tulajdonság által visszaadott tevékenység-fastruktúra nem használható lekérdezze a futásidejű értékeket.

trans-unit.source: The latest definition of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A legújabb definíció a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow has already completed, the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> cannot be retrieved, so the previous definition is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Ha a munkafolyamat már befejeződött, az aktuális <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> nem lehet beolvasni, így az előző definíció lekérése.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> classes in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.
trans-unit.target: Listájának lekérése <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> az <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*> osztályok

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> classes in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.
trans-unit.target: Listája <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> az <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*> osztályok

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>null hivatkozás (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> a Visual Basic nyelvben).</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi az aktuális <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.
